name: Comento, Co. Ltd.
description: Operator of recruiting platform intended to connect job hunters with employment opportunities. The company's platform uses artificial intelligence algorithms to create training boot camp programs and talent referral matching services along with peer-to-peer counseling, enabling job seekers to find the right job.
one_liner: Operator of recruiting platform intended to connect job hunters with employment opportunities.
